fields.summary: Android:  Ti.Platform.macaddress returns wrong value in Android 6. Tested with SDK 6.0.1.GA.

comments.body: Facing with the same issue on Android 7.0 and 6.0. There is no problem on Android 5.x. Tested with sdks 5.2.2.GA & 6.0.3.GA & 6.0.4.GA.
